casebody.data:
The PEOPLE etc., Respondent,
v.
Lionel CHRISTIAN, Appellant. Motion No: 2018-85 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided April 26, 2018

Motion for leave to appeal dismissed upon the ground that no civil appeal lies from the order of the Appellate Division entered in this criminal action (see **500*839NY Const, art VI, § 3 [b]; CPLR 5602 ; CPL 450.90 ).
